ygData.subject: Re: Re: Banshee Aura, Restless Bones
ygData.msgSnippet: Unless you have raided crushbone you can enter neriak... Once you get near the Necro guild you will have to invis to undead... There are 3 ghouls there an if
ygData.messageBody:
Unless you have raided crushbone you can enter neriak... Once you get near
the Necro guild you will have to invis to undead... There are 3 ghouls there
an if they attack you so will the other guild vendors/trainers... and they
will be aggro to you... Once past them you are safe... If you have killed
crushbone orcs... Forget it... They hurt faction with neraik guards and by
default you will be apprenhensive to them...


>From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Banshee Aura, Restless Bones
>Date: Tue, 13 Jul 1999 12:45:42 -0500
>
>
>As A L16 Gnome nec can I enter the home city of Dark Elves and proceed to
>3d
>gate and purchase spells w/o being KOS? Also, is the book Dark Binding,
>the
>one used for research in Necro spells, if not what is its name? To get
>there I
>assume its the boat, get off at human port, and head North to Dark Elf
>city?
>
>
>
>At 12:52 PM 7/13/99 -0400, you wrote:
> >
> > Banshee AUra can occasionally be found in Grobb, although you usually
>have to
> > research that spell. Restless Bones can be found in Grobb, although
>Verant
> > changes spells locations around and it's been awhile since I was level
>20.
> > Spirit Armor simply adds armor to your class and is a pretty good
>spell.
> > The 3 dots do roughly 450-500 damage. As for the pet the best way to use
>one
> > in dungeons is not to use one :).
> >
> > Naeeldark Dark Elf Necromancer of the 31st Circle
>
